name: Butter Pecan Ice Cream
author: SUSAN LONG
summary: Creamy homemade ice cream! Excellent summertime treat!
directions: In a small skillet over medium heat, cook pecans in butter until lightly browned and fragrant, stirring constantly, about 3 to 5 minutes
Whisk eggs in a mixing bowl; set aside
Combine brown sugar and half and half in a saucepan and mix well
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat; remove from heat
Gradually pour hot mixture into the eggs, whisking constantly
Return custard to saucepan and cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture coats the back of a spoon (see Editor's Note)
Remove from heat and stir in cream, vanilla, and pecans
Pour into ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturers' directions
